name: Set Default Business Value
description: Using default logic, initialize the business value to Low only changing with new information.

name: Set Default Business Value Score
description: Initialize the business value score.

name: User Base Assessment
description: Score the number of users.

name: Client Satisfaction Assessment
description: Score how well the application is working.
condition: [(layer is business_value)] AND [(client_satisfaction is good) OR (client_satisfaction is great)]  ;

name: Business Criticality Assessment
description: Score the criticality of the application to the business.

name: Business Value Assessment
description: Assess the business value based on the score.
condition: [(layer is business_value)] AND [(business_value_score is_greater_than 1) OR [(business_value_score is 2) AND (business_criticality is critical)] ;

name: Low Assessment Score Edge Weight
description: Set the low assessment edge weighting for the business value layer.

name: High Assessment Score Edge Weight
description: Set the high assessment edge weighting for the business value layer.

name: Low Business Value Node ID
description: Set the node ID for the low business value node.

name: High Business Value Node ID
description: Set the node ID for the high business value node.

name: Complete Business Value Rule
description: Indicate that the business value assessment is complete.

name: Add Business Value Node to Graph
description: Add the application to the node for the Business Value assessment.  Create the node if non-existent.

name: Add Business Value Edge to Graph
description: Add the edge from the current node to the node for the Business Value assessment.  Use a weighting.

name: Set Current Business Value Node
description: Set the node as the current node.

name: Move to Technical Condition Layer
description: The Business Value assessment is complete.  Move to Technical Condition.

name: Set Default Technical Condition
description: Using default logic, initialize the technical condition to Low only changing with new information.

name: Set Default Technical Condition Score
description: Initialize the technical condition score.

name: Software Technology Assessment
description: Score the state of the software technology.

name: Hardware Technology Assessment
description: Score the state of the hardware technology.
condition: [(layer is technical_condition)] AND [(hardware_technology is good) OR (hardware_technology is excellent)]  ;

name: User Experience Assessment
description: Score the user experience of the application.

name: Technical Condition Assessment
description: Assess the technical condition based on the score.
condition: [(layer is technical_condition)] AND [(technical_condition_score is_greater_than 2) OR [(technical_condition_score is 2) AND (software_technology is excellent)] ;

name: Low Assessment Score Edge Weight
description: Set the low assessment edge weighting for the technical condition layer.

name: High Assessment Score Edge Weight
description: Set the high assessment edge weighting for the technical condition layer.

name: Low Technical Condition Node ID
description: Set the node ID for the low technical condition node.

name: High Technical Condition Node ID
description: Set the node ID for the low technical condition node.

name: Complete Technical Condition Rule
description: Indicate that the technical condition assessment is complete.

name: Add Technical Condition Node to Graph
description: Add the application to the node for the Technical Condition assessment.  Create the node if non-existent.

name: Add Technical Condition Edge to Graph
description: Add the edge from the current node to the node for the Technical Condition assessment.  Use a weighting.

name: Set Current Technical Condition Node
description: Set the node as the current node.

name: Move to Application Risk Layer
description: The Technical Condition assessment is complete.  Move to Application Risk.

name: Set Default Risk
description: Using default logic, initialize the Risk to High only changing with new information.

name: Set Default Application Risk Score
description: Initialize the application risk score.

name: Executive Support Assessment
description: Score the state of executive support.

name: Resource Availability Assessment
description: Score the state of resource availability.
condition: [(layer is application_risk)] AND [(resource_availability is good) OR (resource_availability is excellent)] ;

name: Business Requirements Assessment
description: Score the business requirements of the application.

name: Application Risk Assessment
description: Assess the application risk based on the score.
condition: [(layer is application_risk)] AND [(application_risk_score is_less_than 1) OR [(application_risk_score is 1) AND (resource_availability is excellent)] ;

name: Low Assessment Score Edge Weight
description: Set the low assessment edge weighting for the application risk layer.

name: High Assessment Score Edge Weight
description: Set the high assessment edge weighting for the application risk layer.

name: Low Application Risk Node ID
description: Set the node ID for the low application risk node.

name: High Application Risk Node ID
description: Set the node ID for the high application risk node.

name: Complete Application Risk Rule
description: Indicate that the application risk assessment is complete.

name: Add Application Risk Node to Graph
description: Add the application to the node for the application risk assessment.  Create the node if non-existent.

name: Add Application Risk Edge to Graph
description: Add the edge from the current node to the node for the application risk assessment.  Use a weighting.

name: Set Current Application Risk Node
description: Set the node as the current node.

name: Move to Application Cost Layer
description: The Application Risk assessment is complete.  Move to Application Cost.

name: Set Default Cost
description: Using default logic, initialize the Cost to High only changing with new information.

name: Set Default Application Cost Score
description: Initialize the application cost score.

name: Hardware Maintenance Assessment
description: Score the state of hardware maintenance.

name: Software Maintenance Assessment
description: Score the state of software maintenance.
condition: [(layer is application_cost)] AND [(software_maintenance is low) OR (software_maintenance is medium)] ;

name: Funding Availability Assessment
description: Score the funding availability of the application.

name: Application Cost Assessment
description: Assess the application cost based on the score.
condition: [(layer is application_cost)] AND [(application_cost_score is_less_than 1) OR [(application_cost_score is 2) AND (funding_availability is good)] ;

name: Low Assessment Score Edge Weight
description: Set the low assessment edge weighting for the application cost layer.

name: High Assessment Score Edge Weight
description: Set the high assessment edge weighting for the application cost layer.

name: Low Application Cost Node ID
description: Set the node ID for the low application cost node.

name: High Application Cost Node ID
description: Set the node ID for the high application cost node.

name: Complete Application Cost Rule
description: Indicate that the application cost assessment is complete.

name: Add Application Cost Node to Graph
description: Add the application to the node for the application cost assessment.  Create the node if non-existent.

name: Add Technical Condition Edge to Graph
description: Add the edge from the current node to the node for the application risk assessment.  Use a weighting.

name: Set Current Application Risk Node
description: Set the Start node as the current node.

name: Move to the Modernization Layer
description: The Application Cost assessment is complete.  Move to the Modernization Layer.

name: Set Default Modernization
description: Using default logic, initialize the modernization to Low only changing with new information.

name: Set Default Modernization Score
description: Initialize the modernization score.

name: Application Age Assessment
description: Score the state of the application's age'.

name: Modern Architecture Assessment
description: Score the state of the architecture.
condition: [(layer is modernization)] AND [(architecture is good) OR (architecture is excellent)]  ;

name: Cloud Readiness Assessment
description: Score the cloud readiness of the application.

name: Modernization Assessment
description: Assess the modernization based on the score.
condition: [(layer is modernization)] AND [(modernization_score is_greater_than 2) OR [(modernization_score is 2) AND (architecture is excellent)] ;

name: Low Assessment Score Edge Weight
description: Set the low assessment edge weighting for the modernization layer.

name: High Assessment Score Edge Weight
description: Set the high assessment edge weighting for the modernization layer.

name: Low Modernization Node ID
description: Set the node ID for the low modernization node.

name: High Modernization Node ID
description: Set the node ID for the low modernization node.

name: Complete Modernization Rule
description: Indicate that the modernization assessment is complete.

name: Add Modernization Node to Graph
description: Add the application to the node for the Modernization assessment.  Create the node if non-existent.

name: Add Modernization Edge to Graph
description: Add the edge from the current node to the node for the Modernization assessment.  Use a weighting.

name: Set Current Modernization Node
description: Set the Start node as the current node.

name: Move Back to Business Layer
description: The Modernization assessment is complete.  Move back to the Business Layer.

name: Identify Poor Performing Applications
description: The poorest performing applications will have the lowest weighting from Start to End.

name: Identify Best Performing Applications
description: The best performing applications will have the highest weighting from Start to End.

name: Identify Applications to Retire
description: Applications that are low business value, low technical condition and high cost.

name: Identify Applications to Replace
description: Applications that are high business value, low technical condition and high risk.

name: Identify Applications to Rebuild
description: Applications that are high business value, low technical condition and low modernization.
